import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { getRooms } from "../../middleware/data"; import RoomModal from "../modal/roomModal"; const Roms = () => { let rooms = getRooms(); const [lgShow, setLgShow] = useState(false); return (
Our Rooms

Featured Rooms

{rooms.map((room) => (

{room.name}

{room.description}

${room.price} / night

))}
); }; export default Roms;
